nome: Quoted Tech Clarity Gaming Custom PC
descricao: Custom-built with AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D or Ryzen 9 9950X3D CPUs, up to NVIDIA RTX 5090 GPU, high-performance liquid cooling, DDR5 RAM and PCIe 4/5 NVMe storage in a full-tower chassis; 3‑year warranty.
AMD Ryzen 7 7700 (8‑core/16‑thread, up to 5.3 GHz) with 240 mm RGB liquid cooler, NVIDIA RTX 4070 Super 12 GB, 32 GB DDR5‑6400 MHz RAM, 2 TB NVMe SSD, Windows 11 Pro.
Full‑tower gaming rig with Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU, NVIDIA RTX 5090 GPU, up to 64 GB DDR5‑4800 RAM, 2 TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD (PCIe 5 upgradable), Windows 11 Pro.
Desktop featuring Intel Core i7‑14700KF (20 cores), NVIDIA RTX 4070 series, 32 GB DDR5‑6000 RAM, 1 TB NVMe SSD and 360 mm AIO cooler, Wi‑Fi 6, Windows 11 Pro.
Premium variant of ROG G700: Intel Core Ultra 9 285K (3.2–5.7 GHz), 32 GB DDR5‑6000, 1 TB PCIe Gen 4 SSD, NVIDIA RTX 5090 32 GB GDDR7, Windows 11, Wi‑Fi 6, full RGB setup.
27‑inch Intel iMac (pre‑2022): options include 3.2–3.3 GHz CPUs, up to 2 TB Fusion Drive or SSD, 802.11ac Wi‑Fi and Bluetooth 4.0; discontinued model.
16‑inch MacBook Pro with Apple M4 Pro: 14‑core CPU (10 performance + 4 efficiency), 20‑core GPU, 16‑core Neural Engine, hardware ray‑tracing, high memory bandwidth; configurable up to M4 Max.
Lenovo Yoga Slim 7x Copilot+ 14.5″ 3K OLED (90 Hz) touchscreen, Snapdragon X Elite ARM CPU, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD, Wi‑Fi 7, ~10‑hour battery life.
15.6″ FHD 144 Hz gaming laptop; Intel Core i5‑12500H or i7‑12700H, NVIDIA GTX 1650/1660 Ti or RTX 4050/4070 GPUs, up to 32 GB RAM.
HP Omnibook 5 Flip 14″ convertible with Snapdragon X-series CPU, OLED 2K display, up to 34 hr battery, Microsoft Copilot+ AI features.
Lenovo/HP‑style Chromebook Plus with Gemini AI features: MediaTek-based, OLED 14″, up to 16 GB RAM, Gemini AI on-device, image‑text search, 2 TB cloud storage subscription.
